infoSection.title: About
paragraphs: Developer for over 2 years. As a mobile developer, I dedicated myself to developing my own company on Google Play from scratch, until the publication of the Media Timer. Now, I am looking to build other projects to gain more experience, such as the new application under development Star T-Shirts. With the objective to get an opportunity in the application market using React Native.

As a front-end developer, I currently work on a project with hundreds of clients, the SG Master Web system, where me and my front-end team developed the project from scratch, facing several challenges. I also have personal projects, where I always seek to challenge myself to learn something new.
Lastly, I am a determined person, that have the objective to constantly improve. I don't like fights, trying always to be peaceful. I also, try to learn from others and help as much as possible.

StarTShirts.title: Fictitious e-commerce application, only for t-shirts.

MediaTimer.name: Media Timer
MediaTimer.title: Timer application, with the objective to solve a personal problem.
challengesList: Project with more than 1 year of development
Publishing to Google Play in production
Project License and Privacy Terms
Ability to choose sounds from your phone or app and history of sounds from your phone
Marketing about the project in the company's LinkedIn
App in English/US and Portuguese/BR (depends on your device language) with i18next
Dark and white theme, I created a React Context to manage this state
By native code, I have not allowed cell phones (for example Xiaomi) to change the theme colors for others.
Global States by Redux
Works in the background
Device permissions
I tested accessibility and made to not being possible to change the size of texts by the user's cell phone
The timer logic was complex to develop, since I created it without a library
Notification showing the status of the application and a custom icon for it (imported by Android Studio)
I have updated the Expo SDK version to a newer one
Unique design in Figma
AdMob Advertising
The chosen theme, if the app she can alert at the end of the timer and the history of sounds, are saved in the application cache (local storage)

SGBrSistemas.about: Empresa onde trabalho no time de front-end e que criamos o novo sistema SG Master Web para empresas
challengesList: Criação e manutenção da Landing Page do sistema Web
Desenvolvimento e manutenção do novo sistema SG Master Web
Correção de páginas com desfazer alterações (sendo ele, um botão que aparece na barra de ações que volta os valores do formulário ao estado inicial, seja edição ou cadastro)

Implementação das novas permissões ao usuário. Onde tive que desenvolver duas páginas de formulário, sendo para perfis e usuários. Também troquei todas as permissões do sistema para as novas, criei e dei manutenção no componente de permissões e desenvolvi para funcionar junto ao desfazer alterações
Trabalho conjunto com o time de Back-end, repassando erros e mudanças precisas no front-end
Implementação dos novos filtros V2 do Back-end para selects do modelo antigo e modelo novo no front-end
Refatoração de páginas do modelo antigo para o modelo novo
Desenvolvimento de componentes e arquivos de utilidades reutilizáveis

Customizações de selects, inputs e outros componentes do Quasar por arquivo CSS, deixando o design diferente do padrão do framework. Para ser feita essas mudanças, tive que usar bastante o inspecionador do DevTools

Implementação de margens e envio de e-mail de documentos fiscais, junto ao time de Back-end. Também, em cada módulo e nas configurações do envio de e-mail, pode-se alterar a mensagem do rodapé enviado no e-mail em um editor WYSIWYG
